short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Generate a password between 4 to 20 charecters long

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Do you want more control over your generated passwords? Want to specify the length? Maybe you only want alphabetical characters with numbers and no symbols? Maybe the other way around? Well I have the extension for you! Try it out and let me know how you like it or what you would like to see in future versions.

No data is collected or privacy invaded when extension is installed.
